name: SPACE REPTILE ZROC
description:
SPACE REPTILE ZROC
---
Kill the bad guys, escape the ship, drink soda!

Made in 10 days for Screamworld Jam 2019 ( https://itch.io/jam/screamworld ).

Obviously very inspired by Link's Awakening, I didn't quite manage to get all that I wanted in there but it could definitely be a first draw at the intro stage for a full adventure game.
